lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question, Did the young man speak English?
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题，那个年轻人会说英语吗？

lyrics.text: I had an amusing experience last year.
lyrics.translation: 去年我有一次有趣的经历。

lyrics.text: After I had left a small village in the south of France, I drove on to the next town.
lyrics.translation: 在我离开法国南部的一个小村庄后，我开车前往下一个城镇。

lyrics.text: On the way, a young man waved to me.
lyrics.translation: 在路上，一个年轻人向我挥手。

lyrics.text: I stopped and he asked me for a lift.
lyrics.translation: 我停下来，他请求我让他搭便车。

lyrics.text: As soon as he had got into the car, I said good morning to him in French and he replied
lyrics.translation: 他一上车，我就用法语向他道早安，他回答说

lyrics.text: Apart from a few words, I do not know any French at all.
lyrics.translation: 除了几个单词之外，我一点法语都不懂。

lyrics.text: Neither of us spoke during the journey.
lyrics.translation: 我们俩在旅途中谁也没说话。

lyrics.text: I had nearly reached the town when the young man suddenly said, very slowly, Do you speak
lyrics.translation: 我快到镇上的时候，那个年轻人突然慢慢地说，你会说

lyrics.text: As I soon learnt, he was English himself.
lyrics.translation: 正如我很快了解到的，他自己就是英国人。
